alert.note: Alert for Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Ascension, southeastern West Baton Rouge, southeastern Iberville, south central East Baton Rouge and north central Assumption Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gardere, or near Oak Hills Place, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Plaquemine, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Westminster, Village St. George, Inniswold, Gardere and Carville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 157 and 172. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
